name: SmFly: Gravity Adventure
description:
In the game you have to control the main character from the world of the game "SAMS".
The protagonist "S" is just learning to fly and navigate difficult caves, but as the gravity switches, the task becomes more exciting. You will have an adventure in a dangerous world full of traps and puzzles.

Game features:
  • Gravity adventure
  • Collecting coins
  • Convenient management
  • Difficult levels
